dict.acceptation: 解决；结算；<律>金钱或财产的转让（契约）；沉淀；定居点；

sent.orig: We accept this interim settlement, without prejudice to our claim for a full settlement later on.
sent.trans: 我们接受这次暂时的和解，但这不影响我们继续寻求彻底解决问题的要求。

sent.orig: The net credit or net debit position at settlement time is called the net settlement position.
sent.trans: 在结算时间计算出的净贷记或借记余额称为净结算余额。

sent.orig: The punching settlement is used as the initial parameter for calculating pile shaft compression settlement.
sent.trans: 并利用桩端刺入沉降作为初始参数来计算桩身压缩沉降。

sent.orig: The Cash settlement amount will be payable in the Settlement Currency.
sent.trans: 现金结算金额将支付结算货币。

sent.orig: When petitioning for a settlement, the debtor shall submit a draft settlement agreement.
sent.trans: 债务人申请和解，应当提出和解协议草案。
